# Audiotool Nexus SDK

A JS/TS package that can be used to sync with [Audiotool DAW](https://new.audiotool.com) projects in real time.

Create, process, modify process everything you see on audiotool: devices, mixer, audio, automation, audio tracks. React to changes users make in the DAW in real time.

Read the documentation [here](https://developer.audiotool.com/js-package-documentation/).
